title: I congratulate you RIOT
body:
In my opinion the best skin in the game is by a long shot Eturnum Nocturne, both in game and in splash art and when i heard that Rek'sai was getting an eternum skin i had the feeling of dread that comes when something really good is being re-made and will probably just de-value the original e.g. indianna jones the crystal skull, The last airbender movie ect. But when i saw the skin on skin spotlights on youtube i was impressed at how well the skin is made and how it fits so well with the eternum theme and then i saw the splash art which is almost if not as good as the nocturne one, 
seeming this new skin is not a legendary one i did expect it to de-value the Eternum theme and be just a cheapy version of noc's skin
but i was very wrong and the similarities between the two (while still maintaing the important differences) are really great, plus their map crossing ultimates both chill the blood a little when activated which is a cool theme to keep within the skin range.
So congratulations! you have fully restored my faith in quality sequels thank you :)
and i am very keen for rek'sai now and i wasn't as much before i saw the skin so good work on selling it.

(TLDR congrats on making two cool eternum skins)
